item.description:
**** I just learned that there will be music performance just before the film starting at 6:30pm. ****************
****Tom Rohde, guitarist, will play compositions by Heitor Villa-Lobos.************************************
http://www.drclas.har...

Unfortunately, I will not be able to go for I have a class, however I do plan to go the event late.
If you like to meetup, meet me at the entrance of the auditorium after teh film.

******************************************************************************

Another free movie, Villa-Lobos: Uma Vida de Paixão (2000)

This special event Cosponsored by the Consulate General of Brazil in Boston, Grupo Mulher Brasileira and the Harvard University Brazil Studies Program at DRCLAS to celebrate the 50th anniversary of the death of the great Brazilian composer Heitor Villa-Lobos.

Directed by Zelito Viana
Starring Antonio Fagundes and Marcos Palmeira


http://www.drclas.har...

http://www.mapafilmes...

_______________________

If you like to meet and practice your Portuguese and eat something before the movie, I am planning a pre-meeting at a cafe or place. I will do some research and later confirm this pre-meeting location. In the meantime, mark your calendars.

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: FREE Brazilian Movie! Villa-Lobos: Uma Vida de Paixão ( A Life of Passion)
